text: It was the first win and second nomination for the actor. Gary Oldman won the Academy Award for best actor on Sunday night. The Darkest Hour star beat out Timothee Chalamet ( Call Me by Your Name ), Daniel Day - Lewis ( Phantom Thread ), Daniel Kaluuya ( Get Out ) and Denzel Washington ( Roman J. Israel, Esq. ). The award capped off a season of other honors for Oldman at shows such as the Critics'Choice, Golden Globes, Screen Actors Guild and BAFTA Awards. It was the first Oscar win for the actor. He was previously nominated for best actor for 2011's Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy. In Darkest Hour, Oldman portrays revered U. K. Prime Minister Winston Churchill in the early days of World War II
